author: Staff Reporter
text:
A college student and two graduates were arrested in connection with robbery and chain snatching incidents reported at various places in the district, including Nagercoil town, on Sunday.

B. Manoj (21), pursuing a degree course in an arts college here, R. Suresh Gopi (23), a graduate, and K. Jayaram (24), an engineering graduate, were arrested by Kottar police. They were involved in robbing people of high-end mobile phones and snatching chains. Police recovered one high-end mobile phone from them, the sources said.

All the three were produced before a Magistrate, who remanded them in judicial custody.
title: College student, two graduates arrested
